> **注意**: 此页面尚未翻译成中文。以下内容为英文原版。

```ts
function copyRequest(req): PreparedTransactionRequest
```

Returns a copy of `req` with all properties coerced to their strict types.

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `req` | [`TransactionRequest`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/TransactionRequest) | The transaction request to copy. |

## Returns

[`PreparedTransactionRequest`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/PreparedTransactionRequest)

The prepared transaction request.

## Throws

If the request is invalid.
